name: Egalite
description:
The game is split into two aspects, the visual novel and the platformer to create an infinite loop, the visual novel tells the story of our two leads furthered by the platformer where progress made furthers their narrative. The game loop is a reference to how systematic oppression is nearly impossible to beat having a timer set to the platformer restarting every thirty seconds one has to acquire a boon to add more time to get to the next part of the story, failure to do so resets them to the beginning

This is the story of two people in love from two different families in a village called Séribougou.

But they are forbidden from being together as they are from different classes, Sidy is a servant while Batisan is a noble woman
